Class Jugador

All Implemented Interfaces:
Constantes
public class Jugador
extends Personaje
implements Constantes

Wombat. A Wombat moves forward until it can't do so anymore, at which point it turns left. If a wombat finds a leaf, it eats it.

Version:
1.0.1
Author:
Michael Kolling
